name: Mushroom Awakening
description:
Play as a mushroom to grow out of your cave and awaken in the night.

Made in a week for Godot Wild Jam 44: Fragile.

Concept, Art, Programming, Sound Effects: ccpixel

Music Composition: aokay

  • Sound effects made with ChipTone 
  • Windy sound effect from Mixkit
  • Font: Stay Pixel by Niskala Huruf
  • Art made with Aseprite and Gimp
  • Made with Godot Engine.
